content.rendered:
Meet the TeamWe are A&A

Home

Menu
  • Our Company
  • Our Team
  • Company News

CA RAJARAM DURAIRAJ

Managing Director

About

CA RAJARAM DURAIRAJ

Developing and executing business strategies, CA RAJARAM DURAIRAJ is an ideal leader responsible for the overall success of our business. With proven experience and strong understanding of market changes, he is an expert in business setup solutions. He is a strategic leader with the ability to steer our company in the most profitable direction, while implementing the long-term goals of A&A Associate LLC. His timely advice and comprehensive business plans facilitate cost-effective operations with accurate view of the market.

He communicates well and maintains trust relationships with clients, authorities, and business partners. His expert guidance and motivation drives maximum performance. He is capable to analyze any problematic situation and provide solutions to ensure the prosperous survival of our company.

With good analytical skills and management best practices, he is an excellent leader!

Leadership

Ahmed Abdualla Ali Mohamed Alamiri
Chairman & Partner
View Full Profile

 
CA Rajaram Durairaj
Managing Director
View Full Profile

 
Robin Philip
Director - Assurance And Business Advisory
View Full Profile

 
Georgy John
Director - Operations
View Full Profile

 
Mohammed Firoz Khan
Director – Business Development & Strategic Alliances
View Full Profile

 
Shahid Mulla
General Manager
View Full Profile

 

We work closely with all government agencies

Starting a business in Dubai. We can help you set up in a Freezone, on Mainland or Offshore.

Have a question? Get in touch today
We can provide free qualified guidance to help get you started with your business needs.

Call us today : +971 56 408 6728

Why Us?

Hassle-Free Procedure
Customised Solutions
Multiple Payment Options
Experienced Consultants
